Title: After the Virtual Boy, There’s No Reason Why Nintendo Can’t Bring Back Its Best Handheld

Title: Trump is making a state visit to the U.K., the homeland of his immigrant mother
Description:
President Trump's U.K.
state visit this week won't include the Scottish island where his late immigrant mother was born.
Mary Anne MacLeod was a Gaelic speaker who learned English as a second language.

Title: A VP of product at Google shares the one question she asks herself before changing jobs
Description:
Lots of people pick jobs based on title or salary.
Google's Yulie Kwon Kim says this one question helped her decide if a role was the right fit.

Title: More parents want their kids to learn at home
Description:
Declining birth rates and the growth of school vouchers are hurting public school enrollment.
Homeschooling, though, is on the rise.

Title: I quit my comfortable financial research job to start a drone company. Here's why I took the leap.
Description: Jacob Stonecipher became obsessed with finding a way to reinvent aerial advertising after seeing airplanes flying banners at the Jersey shore.

Title: 'Culling of the herd': Consulting could be headed for a decadelong shift that'll make it harder to climb its career ladder
Description: The consulting sector could be headed for a decade of changes that will make it harder to climb through the ranks, industry experts told Business Insider.

Title: AI can now predict who will go blind, years before doctors can
Description: Researchers trained AI on tens of thousands of eye scans, enabling doctors to predict which keratoconus patients need early treatment and which can be safely monitored, cutting down on unnecessary procedures while preventing vision loss.

Title: Hey Google, let’s get rid of ads in Gmail
Description: Google wrote the playbook for an ad-free experience with YouTube Premium, and we're long overdue for this experience across all of Google.

Title: LIGO Legacy: 10 incredible gravitational wave breakthroughs to celebrate observatory's landmark 2015 find
Description:
The first-ever detection of gravitational waves was made 10 years ago today (Sept.
14).
In celebration, Space.com takes you through the most significant gravitational wave discoveries to date.

Title: Watch SpaceX launch Northrop Grumman's biggest-ever cargo spacecraft on its 1st mission to the ISS today
Description:
SpaceX will launch Northrop Grumman's new "Cygnus XL" cargo ship on its debut mission to the International Space Station this evening (Sept.
14), and you can watch the action live.

Title: Former world champion Hatton dies aged 46
Description: Former world champion Ricky Hatton is found dead at his home in Manchester.
